songs.title: Nazrain Mili
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Dil kho gaya..
Teri meri nazar mili
Saari duniya ko teri meri khabar mili

[Hook (x3)]
Jaise hi, teri meri nazar mili
Saari duniya ko teri meri khabar mili

Jaise hi!

[Hook]
Nazere mili
Dil kho gaya
Hona tha kya
Kya ho gaya

[Fade In]
Duniya ko teri meri khabar mili

[Verse 1]
Jaise hi
Mili teri meri nazar
Labon pe mere bas ek tera hi zikar
Sun ye chala de goli
Mere hands up
Tere haathon mein trigger
Mili teri meri nazar
Mujhe aage piche upar niche
Kisi ki nahi khabar
Rab ne bana di jodi
Chod duniya ko mujhe teri kadar

[Bridge (x2)]
Teri aankhon, ka jaadu
Tere haathon, ka kaabu

[Hook (x2)]
Nazere mili
Dil kho gaya
Hona tha kya
Kya ho gaya

[Bridge (x2)]
Teri aankhon, ka jaadu
Tere haathon, ka kaabu

Teri meri nazar mili
Saari duniya ko teri meri khabar mili

[Hook (x3)]
Jaise hi, teri meri nazar mili
Saari duniya ko teri meri khabar mili

Jaise hi!

[Outro]
Nazere mili
Dil kho gaya
Hona tha kya
Kya ho gaya
